title: Saar Biotech- PCM + CPM + Phenylephrine HCL + Sodium Citrate + Menthol Suspension|Contract Manufacturing Company Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi).The combination of  PCM + CPM + Phenylephrine HCL + Sodium Citrate + Menthol suspension is used for analgesic-antipyretic Paracetamol with decongestant Phenylephrine and an antihistamine Chlorpheniramine.
